headline: Why The Story Around Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) Is Shifting After New Analyst Targets
summary: Host Hotels & Resorts is back in focus after analysts revised their price target for the stock, prompting fresh questions about what has changed in the story around this well known hotel REIT. This update reflects a reassessment of expectations, and the reasons behind that shift are now front and center for investors watching the name.
